title: Products Domain Schema
description: Schema for the Products domain in the Orthogramic Metamodel

title.description: The name or title of the Product

description.description: A detailed explanation of what the Product entails

purpose.description: The intended purpose or function of the Product within the Organization

owner.description: The individual or team responsible for the Product

orgUnitTitle.description: The Organization unit(s) to which the Product is linked

lifecycleManagement.description: Strategies for managing the Product from inception to retirement

marketCompetitiveness.description: Analysis of how the Product compares with competitors

customerFeedback.description: Data on customer satisfaction and Product performance

dependencies.description: Other Products, processes, or systems that the Product depends on

relatedProducts.description: Products that are related or linked to this Product

performanceIndicators.description: Metrics used to measure the success and performance of the Product

risks.description: Potential risks associated with the Product and its lifecycle

improvementOpportunities.description: Areas where the Product can be enhanced or improved

strategicAlignment.description: How the Product aligns with the Organizations strategic goals and objectives

productFeature.description: Features or components of the Product

title.description: The name or title of the Product feature

description.description: A detailed explanation of what the Product feature entails

purpose.description: The intended purpose or benefit of the Product feature

owner.description: The individual or team responsible for the Product feature

orgUnitTitle.description: The Organization unit(s) involved in the Product feature

userStories.description: The user stories or use cases related to the Product feature

technicalSpecifications.description: The technical details and requirements of the Product feature

releasePlan.description: The plan for releasing the Product feature
